column4: I could use some help with compiz, is this the right place to ask?
It's a radeon
how about the obvious question, what about compiz is the issue?
sounds like you clobbered the compiz settings, compiz is a user app or system? lets assume user, delete your compiz config folder within user space
i run KDE, i dont have compiz
no, your /home/somename/
/.config?
sub /compiz or /.compiz is a good place to look
so go the next step, purge compiz and re-install?
do you need compiz?
ah
unless you need glitz on the desktop you dont need it
if you dont have it, vnc may not act up\
i opt for the lesser headless, ssh with x, works for me
the settings are within your userspace then, a purge would have wiped the system settings
the settings are within your userspace then, a purge would have wiped the system settings, you said that your 'mirror' is 'sg.archive......' , change it to 'us.archive......'
the settings are within your userspace then, a purge would have wiped the system settings, you said that your 'mirror' is 'sg.archive......' , change it to 'us.archive......' <-- oops
is broken
un-install compiz completely, via purge, run it without compiz, does issue disappear?
its not compiz then
it only happens via vnc connection?
look at the log /var/log/Xorg.0.log and syslog while at it
